# Exercises, Chapter 09


## Exercise 9.1

```{r}
# setup
targetListOfValues<-c(1:10)
targetListOfValues
# before
cos(targetListOfValues)
# set displayed digits to three
options(digits=3)
cos(targetListOfValues)
# set display width to 40 characters
options(width=40)
cos(targetListOfValues)
# force scientific notation
options(scipen=-1000)
cos(targetListOfValues)
# resist scientific notation
options(scipen=1000)
cos(targetListOfValues)
```

## Exercise 9.2

```{r}
# setup
targetListOfValues<-c(1:10)
options(digits=10)
options(scipen=1000)
options(display=40)
cosValues<-cos(1:10)
cosValues
# round takes two values
#   the vector of values to be rounded
#   signed integer number of decimal places
round(cosValues,2)
round(cosValues,6)
round(cosValues,-2)
round(314.00*cosValues,-2)

```
